extDesc.message: Web Automation Bridge for Google Gemini

prompt_fact_check.message: Verify the veracity of the text below. Point out potential errors, misrepresentations, or missing contexts. Be critical.

prompt_devil_adv.message: Analyze this text and find gaps in argumentation, logical fallacies, or weak points. Attack the thesis presented in the text (Devil's Advocate).

prompt_eli5.message: Explain the selected fragment using simple analogies, as if explaining to a smart 12-year-old. Skip jargon.

prompt_tldr.message: Create a concise summary in bullet points containing only the most important information from this text.

prompt_pass_aggro.message: Analyze the tone of the statement below. Focus on detecting passive aggression, hidden grievances, sarcasm, or fake politeness. Assess if the intention is sincere or manipulative.

prompt_refine.message: Correct grammatical and stylistic errors in this text. Make it sound more professional and clear, but strictly maintain the original meaning.
